SEARCH
Package oogasalad.fileparser

Class DefaultFileParser

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.fileparser.DefaultFileParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileParserApi
public class DefaultFileParser extends Object implements FileParserApi
Provides a default implementation of the FileParserAPI interface.

This class is responsible for parsing level configuration files, which are in XML format. It leverages various helper parsers:

  • LayerDataParser to extract game object and layer information,
  • BlueprintDataParser to extract blueprint data, and
  • EventDataParser to extract event-related information.
The parsed data is then bundled into a LevelData record.

Author:
Billy McCune

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultFileParser

      public DefaultFileParser()
      Constructs a new DefaultFileParser and initializes the helper parsers.

      The constructor instantiates the required helper parsers:

      • LayerDataParser for parsing layer and game object data,
      • BlueprintDataParser for parsing blueprint data, and
      • EventDataParser for parsing level event data.

  • Method Details

    • parseLevelFile

      public LevelData parseLevelFile(String filePath) throws BlueprintParseException, SpriteParseException, LevelDataParseException, HitBoxParseException, GameObjectParseException, PropertyParsingException, EventParseException
      Parses the level XML file and returns a LevelData record.

      Steps:

      • Checks if the levels map contains the given filePath key.
      • Extracts the level name from the file name (removes the ".xml" extension).
      • Locates the actual File corresponding to the level.
      • Parses the XML, retrieves the root element (<map>), and then uses helper parsers to obtain blueprint, layer/game object data, and camera data.
      • Constructs and returns a new LevelData record.
      Specified by:
      parseLevelFile in interface FileParserApi
      Parameters:
      filePath - the key representing the game or level directory
      Returns:
      a LevelData record representing the parsed level
      Throws:
      SAXException - if there is an issue with the xml document parsing
      IOException - if there is an issue with the xml document parsing
      ParserConfigurationException - if there is an issue with the xml document parsing
      BlueprintParseException - if an error occurs while parsing the blueprint data.
      SpriteParseException - if an error occurs while parsing sprite data.
      LevelDataParseException - if an error occurs while parsing level data.
      HitBoxParseException - if an error occurs while parsing hitbox data.
      GameObjectParseException - if an error occurs while parsing game object data.
      PropertyParsingException - if an error occurs while parsing properties.
      EventParseException - if an error occurs while parsing event data.
